data.caption: Filing Of Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30Th June 2024 In Machine-Readable Format
data.news_body:
We refer to our filing dated 23rd July 2024. Due to an inadvertent technical issue, while merging the results cover letter with results pages, the file format got changed to normal one( instead of machine readable). We are now attaching machine readable format of results for quarter ended 30th June 2024.

Please note that there are no changes in the financials/other content of the documents filed yesterday

data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today inter-alia approved the unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2022. The same is enclosed.

Further the Limited Review Report received from the Statutory Auditors of the Company along with the Press Release are also enclosed.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financials Of The Company For Quarter Ended 30Th June 2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today inter-alia approved the unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended 30th June 2022. The same is enclosed.

Further the Limited Review Report received from the Statutory Auditors of the Company along with the Press Release are also enclosed.

data.caption: Disclosure Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of Securities And Exchange Board Of India (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (SEBI (LODR))
data.news_body: Pursuant to provisions of regulation 23(9) of SEBI(LODR), please find enclosed herewith disclosures of Related Party Transactions for the half year ended 31st March 2022.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: This is further to our letter dated 19th May 2022, intimating earnings call on 30th May 2022, the transcript of the said earnings call is available on the Company's website at https://www.diageoindia.com/investors/financials/investor-press-releases/earnings-call-transcript-fy22q4/ .

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Further to our intimation dated 19th May 2022 regarding investors' call, the audio recording of the call held today is available on our website. The same can be accessed through below link:https://www.diageoindia.com/investors/financials/corporate-presentations/fy22q4-investor-call-recording/

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Further to our intimation dated 19th May 2022 regarding investors' call, enclosed presentation which will be used in the call.

data.caption: Results - Financial Results For Year Ended 31St March 2022
data.news_body:
In continuation of our letter dated 17th May 2022, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, at its meeting held today, has inter alia :

i) Approved the Audited Financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2022. The said results in the prescribed format along with Independent Auditors' Report are enclosed herewith. A copy of the press release is also enclosed for your reference.

ii) The Independent Auditors have issued an unmodified opinion, as referred in para 2 of Auditor's Report (AR) on the standalone financial results and para 2 of AR on consolidated financial results.

data.caption: Announcement U/R 30 - Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 31St December 2021
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today, approved inter-alia the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2021.

data.caption: Financial Results - Half-Year & Quarter Ended 30Th September 2021
data.news_body: The Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today, approved inter-alia the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the half-year and quarter ended 30th September 2021 ('UFR'). The Limited Review Report ('LRR') thereon, received from the Statutory Auditors of the Company on the standalone and consolidated financial results were placed at the said Meeting. UFR along with the LRR and a Press Release in respect of this UFR are enclosed
